articles.description: It’s nearly half a second faster to 62mph than the RWD car. M4 xDrive starts at £78k
articles.content: BMW has a penchant for throwing M3 curveballs, as weve explained, and heres the latest albeit less surprising effort. This is the new four-wheel-drive BMW M3 (and M4) offering what can be sensibly de… [+1742 chars]
